Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.1 Ganthaduka » 5.1.1 Paṭiccavāra » 5.1.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 5.1.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejātādi
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Napurejātādi
7.
1630Ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe idaṃsaccābhinivesaṃ kāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho (arūpe sīlabbataparāmāso natthi, evaṃ nava pañhā kātabbā), napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
<< Naārammaṇādiup5.1.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
